title: Ending_Start
body:
<<setsprite Right Carabosse neutral>><<setsprite Left Talia neutral>><<setname Right Carabosse>><<setname Left Talia>>No! How... could it be...?
[[Next|2]]

Face it, Carabosse, your days of ruining this kingdom are over!
[[Next|3]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Now, all I have to do is bring one of the princes here and have them kiss Briar Rose.
[[Next|4]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Then, she'll wake up and everything will be happily ever after!
[[Next|5]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Ohohohoho! Is that so?
[[Next|6]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Funny thing about this curse is... By putting her to sleep for eternity... I really meant she would die after a few hours!
[[Next|7]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> In fact, we're probably within two minutes of her death now!
[[Next|8]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> And your precious princes are nowhere to be seen! Ohohohoho! The prophecy will come true after all!
[[Next|9]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Unless you see her true love anywhere around here, your princess' days--no, minutes--are numbered!
[[Next|12]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> No!
[[Next|10]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Oh, yes!
[[Next|11]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> No... Briar Rose... You can't die...
[[Next|13]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Like... Like a friend who is also a girl...
[[Next|16]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> You're my best friend... You can't just die like this...
[[Next|14]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> I care about you so much... Like.. a friend...
[[Next|15]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> ... A girlfriend...
[[Next|17]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> I... I love you...
[[Next|20]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> I love you!
[[Next|21]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> ... A girlfriend?
[[Next|18]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> I... That's right. I do care about you.
[[Next|19]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Wh-what are you doing?
[[Next|23]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Briar Rose neutral>> Huh... Where am I...?
[[Next|24]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Briar Rose neutral>> ...Talia...?
[[Next|25]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Briar Rose... I love you...
[[Next|26]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Briar Rose neutral>> I love you too. I always have.
[[Next|22]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> You can't just reawaken the princess like that! That's not fair!
[[Next|27]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Face it Carabosse, you lost.
[[Next|28]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Now begone!
[[Next|29]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Arghhhh... This isn't the last you've seen of me...
[[Next|30]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Briar Rose neutral>> Thank you, Talia. For breaking the curse. How could I ever repay you?
[[Next|31]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> Well, unlimited riches would be nice...
[[Next|32]]

<<setsprite Left neutral>> But all I really need is for you to love me!
[[Next|33]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Briar Rose neutral>> Well, that's easy. I already do!
[[Next|34]]
~And so, the princess and the fairy lived happily ever after~
